details: When creating an account, a user will see two options, Buyer or Seller. If a user wants to be a seller he or she can register as a seller.
Buyer, Seller and Admin have their different dashboard.
Buyer can make payment with online card payment and Seller can add and remove products, make advertisement of a product and Admin can remove any user, and see all reports
Raihan's Delivery is one of the delivery companies who is trying to contribute to Bangladesh’s economy and to help the small businesses.
A user can add services so that he/she can provide that service
A User can see other’s reviews as well as he/she can review the services
The Blockchain Technology is the future of our Internet. In near future, the web2.0 is going to transfer fully into web3.0. So, it's the high time for learning Blockchain.
A user can purchase any courses and get premium access
User can also download pdf of the premium course’s pages
